constituent: hillock, soil, dirt, ground, crown, pig, sow
koohiiStory1: There´s already King of the Hill. This is Queen of the Hillock. It´s Ms. Piggy sitting on top of a mound of soil in her crown.
koohiiStory2: The crowned sow (we met her in overpowering) is standing atop her little mound of earth - hillock - the undisputed champeen of all the pigsty.
